info.name: RESTful API with Java 21 and Spring Boot 3
info.description: This API simulates basic registration of people to a MySQL database using CRUD.

request.description: Updates a person by passing in a JSOn, XML or YML representation of the person!
Add a new person by passing in a JSOn, XML or YML representation of the person!
Deletes a person referring to the provided id!
Updates a book by passing in a JSOn, XML or YML representation of the book!
Add a new book by passing in a JSOn, XML or YML representation of the book!
Deletes a book referring to the provided id!
